title: Cardiac events and dynamic echocardiographic and electrocardiogram changes following osimertinib treatment in lung cancer
details: JN Le, JO Gasho, O Peony, A Singh, KD Silos, S Kim… - Frontiers in Cardiovascular …, 2024
abstract: Osimertinib is first-line treatment for epidermal growth factor (EGFR)-mutated non- small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) and has been associated with cardiotoxicity. However, the nature of cardiac remodeling and associated risk factors remains …
